item.title: MongoDB Replicaset Volume Expansion
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. MongoDB Replicaset Volume Expansion This guide will show you how to use KubeDB Enterprise operator to expand the volume of a MongoDB Replicaset database. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
